 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גְּשֵׁם‎</span>] **noun masculine**<sup>[[Dan.4.30|Dan 4:30]]</sup> ==body== (see √  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גשׁם‎</span> in Biblical Hebrew; <lookup onclick="bdbabb('Tg')"><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ7‎</span><sup>**J**</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גּוּשְׁמָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גִּשְׁמָא‎</span> ([[BDB#Dalm|D]]<sup>WB 83</sup>), Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***body, self***); — ***body*** of man, suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גִּשְׁמֵהּ‎</span> [[Dan.4.30|Dan 4:30]]; [[Dan.5.21|Dan 5:21]], so plural suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גַּשְׁמַיהוֺן‎</span> ([[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 15 a</sup>) [[Dan.3.27|Dan 3:27]]. 28, both [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גֶּשְׁמֵהוֺן‎</span> ([[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 54, 3</sup> ***b***)).
